org.bonitasoft.engine.home

Class BonitaHomeClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bonitasoft.engine.home.BonitaHome
      • org.bonitasoft.engine.home.BonitaHomeClient

  • public final class BonitaHomeClient
extends BonitaHome
    Utility class that handles the path to the client part of the bonita home

    The client part of the bonita home contains connection information to the server and can also contains working directories for client application of the bonita engine

    Since:
    6.0.0
    Author:
    Baptiste Mesta, Matthieu Chaffotte
